snippet.title: The Mystery of the Crystal Portal for Windows Store
snippet.description:
Featuring innovative hidden object gameplay, an intriguing storyline, and stunning full-screen graphics, The Mystery of the Crystal Portal is a thrilling escape for the whole family. Embark on a brain-bending adventure with Nicole, who's father went missing after making a discovery that could "change the course of humanity".

Play now: http://apps.microsoft.com/windows/app/the-mystery-of-the-crystal/ff66ec1a-a0fa-4325-ba86-fc7abc4e299c
